data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Piccoli, Gustavo Cauê De Oliveira, Araújo, Marcel Santos De, Rezende, José Marcos, Gonçalves, Ana Zangirolame (2015): A new species of Xystonotus Wolcott, 1900 (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Mideopsidae) from bromeliad phytotelmata in Brazilian Atlantic rainforest. Zootaxa 3981 (1): 147-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.1.10
